Class ConstantShiftDecimalMasker

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDictionaryMasker<java.lang.Double>, IInstanceMasker<java.lang.Double>

    public class ConstantShiftDecimalMasker
extends AbstractInstBasedDictMasker<java.lang.Double>
    Masks instances of decimal data by adding a constant value.
